text: Malaa, gei Nebuchadnezzar mo ana gau dauwa huogodoo gu lloomoi, ga heebagi gi Jerusalem i di madangaholu laangi o di madangaholu malama o di hiwa ngadau nogo king ai Zedekiah. Digaula gaa hau nadau waahale laa i daha mo di waahale, gaa hau di nadau abaaba e duuli haganiga di maa,52.4 Ezekiel 24.2
